# MTV Europe Music Award for Best Romanian Act

The following is a list of the MTV Europe Music Award winners and nominees for Best Romanian Act.
2000s
{| class="wikitable"
! Year !! Winner !! Nominees
|-
| 2002 || Animal X ||
|-
| 2003 || AB4 ||
|-
| 2004 || Ombladon (featuring Raku) ||
|-
| 2005 || Voltaj ||
|-
| 2006 || DJ Project ||
|-
| 2007 || Andreea Bănică ||
|-
| 2008 || Morandi ||
|-
| 2009 || INNA ||
|}
